dailyTips: üíß Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.
ü•¨ Include leafy greens like spinach, sukuma in meals.
üçå Eat seasonal fruits like mango, pawpaw, bananas, guava, oranges.
ü•ò Eat more beans, peas, and legumes for protein.
üßº Wash fruits and vegetables before eating.
üç≥ Use steaming or boiling instead of frying.
üçö Prefer whole grains like brown rice, millet, or oats.
üçó Include lean proteins like fish, eggs, chicken, and beans.
